content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sometimes we need to test APIs in order to check that we are getting the correct responses on our app and we performed it with tools like SoapUI or Postman, but we can do it easily without writing the request sentences, only interacting with the application and checking the calls. We can do this with Charles and Proxyman.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHere we are going to review how to setup Charles on our device and start checking the calls that our application performs.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rFirst, we need to install Charles on our computer, it is available for Windows, MacOS and Linux at charlesproxy.com. Our system and mobile device should be connected on the same network.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAfter that, we run the Charles app and go to Help>SSL Proxying>Install Charles Root Certificate on a Mobile Device or Remote Browser.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":357076,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9c8f2a30-2569-499a-be71-5129fb0e147c/l.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9c8f2a30-2569-499a-be71-5129fb0e147c/l.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"l.png\",\"name\":\"l.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9c8f2a30-2569-499a-be71-5129fb0e147c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":829,\"height\":224},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"And we are going to get this pop-up.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":90040,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/df2f3bfa-1650-488a-8641-d6b6844e2cfb/l2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/df2f3bfa-1650-488a-8641-d6b6844e2cfb/l2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"l2.png\",\"name\":\"l2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"df2f3bfa-1650-488a-8641-d6b6844e2cfb\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":823,\"height\":184},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now on our device, we need to go to our network settings and add the HTTP proxy that we get on the pop-up.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":41818,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/173c305a-cd7d-480e-8d28-8e243a5acfc9/l5.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/173c305a-cd7d-480e-8d28-8e243a5acfc9/l5.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"l5.jpg\",\"name\":\"l5.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"173c305a-cd7d-480e-8d28-8e243a5acfc9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":570,\"height\":569},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We open the browser and navigate, as soon we navigate, we are going to get other pop-up asking for permission.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":90953,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cd25c43c-2588-4d9f-a101-f16d15158dba/l6.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cd25c43c-2588-4d9f-a101-f16d15158dba/l6.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"l6.png\",\"name\":\"l6.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cd25c43c-2588-4d9f-a101-f16d15158dba\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":713,\"height\":148},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On Android the application that we are going to test needs to have a configuration to use the installed SSL certificate, but on both iOS and Android we need to navigate to chls.pro/ssl and install the SSL CA Certificate.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAfter completing these steps, we are ready to start checking the app requests. We only need to interact on the app and the calls will be logged and the most recent will be highlighted on yellow for few seconds after occurs. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe can see on overview the status of the call.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":179875,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/73248655-4ed6-4a64-a33a-3d81ce18ca6b/l9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/73248655-4ed6-4a64-a33a-3d81ce18ca6b/l9.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"l9.png\",\"name\":\"l9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"73248655-4ed6-4a64-a33a-3d81ce18ca6b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":910,\"height\":569},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On Contents we can see the response that we get from the API.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":209130,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0bd09e09-6415-4d8c-96a6-0dd25b1a595e/l10.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0bd09e09-6415-4d8c-96a6-0dd25b1a595e/l10.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"l10.png\",\"name\":\"l10.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0bd09e09-6415-4d8c-96a6-0dd25b1a595e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":949,\"height\":594},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LOGS\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOn Mobile Testing we use many times logs to help developers to identify and fix an issue on the code. Right now, there are on the market many Mobile Crash Reporting software that could be included on the app and send the logs automatically to the developers if any issue occurs, but in case we need to get the logs manually, this is what we need to do.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\riOS\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe only need to open XCode with the device connected via USB and go to Devices and Simulators.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":216623,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/66b58f38-9df9-4d66-8a2e-ddc7f37ff54a/v.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/66b58f38-9df9-4d66-8a2e-ddc7f37ff54a/v.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"v.png\",\"name\":\"v.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"66b58f38-9df9-4d66-8a2e-ddc7f37ff54a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":806,\"height\":285},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Then click on\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" View Device Logs\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":58290,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/68527596-c313-4c84-92e9-481041b6055e/v2.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/68527596-c313-4c84-92e9-481041b6055e/v2.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"v2.JPG\",\"name\":\"v2.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"68527596-c313-4c84-92e9-481041b6055e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":812,\"height\":273},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"And here we will find our logs.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":704561,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a79e2647-bdcf-4d7b-a095-8b10414cb8d5/v3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a79e2647-bdcf-4d7b-a095-8b10414cb8d5/v3.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"v3.png\",\"name\":\"v3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a79e2647-bdcf-4d7b-a095-8b10414cb8d5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":796,\"height\":628},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Android\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For Android we need to have the Android SDK installed, our device connected and USB Debugging activated on the device.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe can check if our device is already connected with the command: adb devices \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":34890,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6eb522e3-4a78-4118-b0ed-821e315062a1/v4.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6eb522e3-4a78-4118-b0ed-821e315062a1/v4.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"v4.jpg\",\"name\":\"v4.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6eb522e3-4a78-4118-b0ed-821e315062a1\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":796,\"height\":417},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Then we only need to use the command: adb logcat\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":229264,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1bd364e3-a7df-43e6-b244-4663963f2616/v5.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1bd364e3-a7df-43e6-b244-4663963f2616/v5.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"v5.jpg\",\"name\":\"v5.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1bd364e3-a7df-43e6-b244-4663963f2616\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":809,\"height\":420},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If we have Android Studio 2.2 we found one tab while running our app on the device connected.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":749256,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ddea86e8-97e2-4593-b735-bf5148f0de50/v6.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ddea86e8-97e2-4593-b735-bf5148f0de50/v6.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"v6.png\",\"name\":\"v6.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ddea86e8-97e2-4593-b735-bf5148f0de50\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":817,\"height\":322},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
